word:
Those who will open their understanding to comprehend these things, will make wonderful reforms in their lives. The apostle writes, "Ye are God's husbandry, ye are God's building." Those who are perfecting Christian 


                                         -367- 

characters will make decided changes in their lives that they may present themselves to God holy and blameless, without spot, or wrinkle, or any such thing.--Ms 143, 1899, pp. 10, 11. ("Co-workers With Christ," typed October 4, 1899.)
